name: Magic Alchemist Xmas
description:
Christmas Edition of Magic Alchemist!

It's Christmas time! On your journey to become the most famous and glorious Xmas alchemist you have to merge Christmas objects until you discover the final and most mysterious Xmas object!

Magic Alchemist Xmas Edition is an easy to learn game but nonetheless challenging. A free atmospherical Christmas game for hours of fun!

This version is free of advertising. The ad-supported version is called "Magic Alchemist Xmas Edition"

* same gameplay rules as the original Magic Alchemist
* addictive gameplay
* Christmas HD graphics
* beautiful Xmas visual effects
* atmospheric Christmas background music
* lovely Christmas sound effects
* intuitive touchscreen controls
* local highscores for your device
* global highscores for all versions of Magic Alchemist
* leave the game anytime and continue your session later
* a free Xmas game for the best season of the year!
* Christmas Trees
* Santa Claus
* Merry Christmas!

If you have suggestions for the Christmas Magic Alchemist or if you experience a problem with this Xmas game please write to me: erdenkriecher@online.de.
